data.eml:eml: A review of Norwegian streptaster-bearing Astrophorida (Porifera: Demospongiae: Tetractinellida), new records and a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cárdenas, Paco, Rapp, Hans Tore (2012): A review of Norwegian streptaster-bearing Astrophorida (Porifera: Demospongiae: Tetractinellida), new records and a new species. Zootaxa 3253: 1-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.280590
